title: The Oozing Barrel
description: A barrel of 'Void-Wine' is leaking a dangerous joy into the tavern cellar...

turns.narrative: The tavern cellar is flooded with a purple, carbonated liquid that smells of 'Void-Berries' and hot brass. One barrel is 'Gurgling' a rhythmic code.
turns.convergence: The liquid tastes like a summer storm and static. It’s highly addictive but turns your tongue a permanent neon-purple (+1 Lore).

turns.narrative: A 'Barrel-Beast'—a construct of wood-staves and iron-hoops—is 'Protecting' the oozing wine with a roar of escaping gas.
turns.choice_b: Douse the fire with the purple wine
turns.convergence: The wine is actually 'Fire-Retardant' mana. It extinguishes the beast’s 'Internal-Pilot-Light'.

turns.narrative: The floor of the cellar is dissolving into 'Purple-Mud'. You find a 'Void-Flask' at the bottom of the vat.
turns.convergence: The flask contains the 'Essence of a Lost-Summer'—a liquid that can heal any mental scar.

turns.narrative: The Tavern-Master reveals he found the barrel in the 'Warp-Docks'. He’s been selling it as 'Special-Reserve'.
turns.convergence: The air is sweet and dizzying. You feel a sense of 'Artificial-Joy' that hides a deep, cold fear.

turns.narrative: A 'Wine-Wraith'—a spirit of a drunkard made of purple steam—appears, singing a 'Drinking-Song of the Void'.
turns.convergence: The song reveals the coordinates to a 'Hidden-Vineyard' in the Scourge-Fringes. (+1 Intel)

turns.narrative: The 'Barrel-Beast' reforms, but its eyes are now soft blue. It’s 'Tame'. It offers you its 'Master-Hoop' as a shield.
turns.convergence: The hoop is made of 'Void-Iron' and reflects all magical attacks.

turns.narrative: The Tavern-Master gives you a 'Purple-Stain'—a permanent mark on your hand that allows you to detect 'Tainted-Liquids'.
turns.convergence: The mark glows when near poison. It’s a 'Utility-Skill'.

turns.narrative: The Cellar is clean, the purple wine now bottled as 'High-Ward-Extract'. The smell of ozone remains, however.
turns.convergence: The sun sets, the horizon matching the color of the wine you just cleared.

turns.narrative: As you leave, you feel 'Light-Headed' but strong. The world looks a little more colorful tonight.
turns.convergence: The Tavern-Master promises you free drinks for a month. (+5 Morale)

turns.narrative: Quest ends in the Tavern. The 'Oozing Barrel' is a new specialty tonight.

conclusion: The mission regarding 'The Oozing Barrel' is complete. Quest Complete.

risk_matrix.penalty: You are dissolved into a puddle of purple wine. (Quest Failed)
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Tavern reports cellar flooding with purple carbonated fluid

permanent_effects.settlement: Cellar cleared; Void-Wine bottled as High-Ward-Extract
permanent_effects.world: Hidden Vineyard in Scourge-Fringes as future destination
